review: Works great with my Smart phone and was easy to set up.

review: Very limited support for apps. Streaming from laptop is not perfect. Good for the price.

review: I'm so happy w/my chromecast. I understand WHAT its used for and really happy w/it since I cut the cable cord.

review: Easy to use and set up. Lots of uses for such a cheap price.

review: Works as advertised. Great concept and I'm sure new content will arrive shortly.
